"Defeat the Combined Hostile Forces":
"Defeat all hostiles, including any
reinforcements that join the battle!"

"Defeat all hostiles, including any
reinforcements that join the battle!"

"援護に来たエネミーを含め

"援護に来たエネミーを含め

"Sensors have picked up more hostiles approaching!
Defeat them all!"

お疲れ様でした！"

Defeat all the hostiles."

敵性存在は全て撃破しろ。"

"敵性存在の反応消失。
よくやったな。"

activity. Great work!"
